title: Indeed a bug in ezboard
content:
Request Error - No such file or directory ("/home/ezDude/bbs/boards/6/656/publiccommanderkeenforum/other/2103.topic.dir")An error has occurred executing your request.

No such file or directory ("/home/ezDude/bbs/boards/6/656/publiccommanderkeenforum/other/2103.topic.dir")

If you feel you may have information which would be helpful in determining the cause of this problem, please post a bug report here at the ezboard bugs help forum: Report Request Errors!Stack backtrace:

-Got that when trying to reply here. Wasn't even able to acces Keenrush's post with same topic; it worked the first time I looked but not when I decided to post this error. Hopes it gets fixed soon.-------------------------------
If something's HARD to do, then it's NOT worth doing. -Homer J. Simpson

title: Re: Indeed a bug in ezboard
content: Yeah.. As well, this topic proves I'm not insane and the only one getting these bugs. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
